bot.description: Hello! I will notify you when Twitch broadcasts start.

errors.badUsername: {{ streamer }} - username can only contain "a-z", "0-9" and "_" symbols.

follow.enter:
Enter username of streamer you want to follow.
You can use multiple links to streamers.

Type /cancel for cancel action.

follows.total: You followed to notifications from {{ count }} channels. Click on streamer nickname to unfollow from notifications.

streams.newCategory: 🔄 {{ channelLink }} updated category from {{ oldCategory }} to {{ category }}
streams.titleChanged: 🔄 {{ channelLink }} updated title from {{ oldTitle }} to {{ title }}
streams.titleAndCategoryChanged: 🔄 {{ channelLink }} updated title from {{ oldTitle }} to {{ title }} and category from {{ oldCategory }} to {{ category }}
